TopicTitle: [1.0] Quickload opens new instance, Quicksave not working

Articles.Content:
Hey there,

I have the following issue with 1.0 on windows 7 64bit:

Stock game, created new career (with quicksave/load available). Normal game only with destructible buildings disabled.

  • Quicksave (F5) doesn't work at all, no quicksave.sfs in save folder
  • Quickload (F9) opens a complete new instance of the game

I installed the game from scratch, doesn't help. Keybindings are correct.

Just wanted to report it and see if somebody can confirm this or if I have done something really dumb to break it.

Thanks,

Jaden

Edited April 27, 2015 by Jaden
Solved!
Hi Jaden, where is KSP installed? And can you check the support stickies and post your logs please.

Steam installation: C:\Games\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program

Log: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26398773/output_log.txt

KSP.log: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26398773/KSP.log

Thanks for looking into it.

Edited April 27, 2015 by Jaden
added KSP.log

Ok I am an Idiot. Sorry for wasting everybody's time.

The Keyboard functions were set incorrectly It wasn't even recognizing F5 as F5. I'm still not sure why it would open a new instance of KSP (M600, [a]-key default Task) but it doesn't matter.

Again sorry for wasting resources. Thanks anyway and keep it up!

Jaden
Heh, not a problem Jaden, you may not be the only one to get this issue so your thread can help others
